favourite.article: Lord, in Your ascension You are a King and Priest. May we be those who consecrate ourselves to You and be refreshing to You as You constitute as warriors to be victors with You at Your coming back.
Our Christ is God and Man in Glory He is the Key to changing the earth's rule to His glorious Rule with His God-men who have overcome. Praise Him.
Dear Lord may we be the ones who are a drink to You today.
